attributes.action: Provide equality regarding Court Judgements on Access and Residency for children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: More often than not, Courts award residence to the Mother over the Fathers without justification regardless of what the Father can offer the child/ren. What is often not considered is what the children need. Court Orders are made and ignored, which causes ignored stress and strain on the children. Childrens rights must be considered and if ignored by either parent, punished.
